job description:
Senior Research Scientist
If you are a Senior Data Scientist, with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
You will be part of an amazing team offering a revolutionary product for next-gen persistent in-memory computing. We are fundamentally disrupting traditional enterprise computing, driving extreme improvements in processing speed, data storage, data security, and total cost of IT operations.
What You Will Be Doing
You will research, test, benchmark, optimize, co-architect and co-engineer the product performance and stability validation activities to extend the company's product and IP leadership. You will work with internal engineering team and, when needed, with external partners and customers.

-Select, configure, and execute appropriate application performance tests (such as VMmark, TPC, SPEC, FIO, etc.)
-Engineer, configure, and execute long-term product stability tests
-Develop performance models for the existing and for the next-gen products
-Co-develop (with the rest of the R&D team) various performance-improvement and stability-improvement IP to advance the company's goals
-Assume project management responsibilities (i.e. initiating projects, creating schedules, resources allocation, etc.) when needed
-Work closely with software developers, QA and reliability, and other teams and interface with sales and business development teams in order to identify requirements for future technologies, tools and features.
-Research academic and industrial publications related to the area of work
-Create and maintain documentation (i.e. research reports and presentations, software requirements, architecture and design specification, user manual, etc.) in support of your work
-Over time, expand to other related projects and areas
What You Need for this Position
At Least 3 Year of experience and knowledge of:

-Ph.D. or M.S. in Computer Science, EE, Physics, with strong understanding of computer architecture, operation, hardware and software
-Strong analytical skills including modeling and data analytics
-Understanding of hypervisors and virtualized environment
-Application Performance Test
-Product Stability Test
- Benchmark Test
-Software Interaction
-Performance
-SQL
What's In It for You
Full Benefits
Medical, Vision, Dental
Stock Options
Bonus
401k
So, if you are a Senior Data Scientist, with experience, please apply today!
